name: ionic ssl generate
description:
Uses OpenSSL to create a self-signed certificate for **localhost** (by default).

After the certificate is generated, you will still need to add it to your system or browser as a trusted certificate.

The default directory for `--key-path` and `--cert-path` is `.ionic/ssl/`.

options.name: country-name
options.summary: The country name (C) of the SSL certificate

options.name: state-or-province-name
options.summary: The state or province name (ST) of the SSL certificate

options.name: locality-name
options.summary: The locality name (L) of the SSL certificate

options.name: organization-name
options.summary: The organization name (O) of the SSL certificate

options.name: common-name
options.summary: The common name (CN) of the SSL certificate

options.name: bits
options.summary: Number of bits in the key
